text: Koma wina amene anali kudziwa Mawu a Mulungu adati “Ine ndidzakubweretserani msanga musadaphenire maso anu.” Ndipo pamene iye adaona kuti mpando wabwera kwa iye adati, “Ichi ndi chisomo cha Ambuye wanga kuti andiyese ngati ndikuthokoza kapena sindikuthokoza. Ndipo aliyense amene athokoza atero podzipezera yekha zabwino. Ndipo amene sathokoza ndithu, Ambuye wanga ali ndi zonse ndipo ndi Wolemekezeka.”
